title: Longest party in power since 2000 is Nigeria PDP

content.question: Since 2000, which of the following political parties has held the executive branch of its respective country for the longest period?

choices.label: The Communist Party of the Russian Federation
The People’s Democratic Party of Nigeria
The Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI) in Mexico
The Conservative Party in Great Britain

content.answer: The People’s Democratic Party of Nigeria

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
